title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

title: Halloween
description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister, Michael Myers escapes and returns to his hometown to kill again on Halloween night.

title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
description: Teenagers are terrorized in their dreams by the vengeful spirit of Freddy Krueger, a disfigured serial killer.

title: Hereditary
description: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences after the death of their secretive grandmother.

title: The Exorcist
description: When a young girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.

title: Get Out
description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's family estate and uncovers a disturbing secret.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence.

title: Scream
description: A year after her mother's murder, a teenage girl is terrorized by a masked killer who targets her and her friends.

title: Insidious
description: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

title: It Follows
description: A young woman is followed by an unknown supernatural force after a sexual encounter.
